citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
A documented, veterinary approved avian environmental enhancement plan was not in place, although many enrichment
practices were evident at the time of inspection. The plan ensures that appropriate planning for social grouping, physical
environmental enrichment and any special considerations for birds with special needs is in place. The facility must ensure
the environmental enhancement plan is documented and approved by the veterinarian.
Correct by 29 December 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
A documented, veterinary approved avian environmental enhancement plan was not in place, although many enrichment 
practices were evident at the time of inspection. The plan ensures that appropriate planning for social grouping, physical 
environmental enrichment and any special considerations for birds with special needs is in place. The facility must ensure 
the environmental enhancement plan is documented and approved by the veterinarian. 
 
Correct by 29 December 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
